description:
Non-material amendment to planning permission reference P2018/1146/FUL, dated 03/05/2019 which granted permission for the following: 

The proposal involves works including the widening of the existing east - west footpath between the pedestrian access points off Carnoustie Drive and Pembroke Street, installation of a new ramp and steps and other associated works including the installation of motor scooter barriers and new landscaping works.

The amendments sought include: 

1 Design alterations to the approved motorcycle barrier.

2 Design alterations of central area to ensure the existing fencing be blocked to prevent motorcycle access.

3 Extension of central ramp into car parking bay area to accommodate manhole cover inaccurately plotted in TOPO survey and the omission of signage from scheme.
decision_conditions: The council would like to highlight that the hereby approved agreed minor amendments to the extant permission ref P2018/1146 dated 03/05/2019 does not grant any permission for the pre commencement conditions attached to this permission which will need to be formally determined and discharged by the council through a formal submission by the applicants.
